alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 8:28PM CST until February 26 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor over bank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 20.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CST Friday was 20.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 14.0 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 20.1 Fri 7 pm CST 19.3 18.6 17.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 930 AM CST.
